abstract: Ford, General Motors and Honda, among others, ended March in losing territory. Fiat Chrysler and Toyota posted modest gains.
snippet: Ford, General Motors and Honda, among others, ended March in losing territory. Fiat Chrysler and Toyota posted modest gains.
lead_paragraph: The optimism of automakers introducing models on Wednesday at the New York auto show was tempered by reports of flat sales in the United States last month.

headline.main: Auto Sales Slow After Months of Healthy Growth
headline.print_headline: U.S. Auto Sales Were Flat in March, After Months of Growth

byline.original: By Bill Vlasic and Aaron M. Kessler
